text: Jaume (or Santiago) Vallcorba Plana (21 September 1949 - 23 August 2014) was a Spanish philologist and publisher. He published many studies on aesthetics and literature. He was born in Tarragona, Spain. He was a professor in Literature at the University of Bordeaux, the University of Lleida, the University of Barcelona and the Pompeu Fabra University (Barcelona) but he left university teaching in 2004. ==Other websites== *El Pa√≠s, 14/05/2010 (Interview with Jaume Vallcorba) Category:1949 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Spanish writers Category:Spanish academics
title: Jaume Vallcorba Plana
